msbt.message: How can I portray a character with no ego at all What would my motivation be? Oh, it's you! Sorry, I was just deep in thought. You know, acting stuff. The biz. The grind. What do you mean "what part am I playing?" I don't have a part YET. It's called ACTING. I'm ACTING like an ACTOR. Yeesh.
<20_2 arg="6" /><10_10 />GAH!<20_3 arg="6" /> It's you! <10_9 />Sorry, I'm just in the middle of something right now.
Should I take up or to increase my brand's Q score <20_2 arg="6" /><10_10 />WHOA! <20_3 arg="6" />It's you! <10_9 />Sorry, but can this wait until later?
